title: Treasure Font?
content:
Does anyone know a font similar to this? I thought it looked like a Sudtipos font but I can't find it. Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415203813im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Treasure_4451.gif)
author: packagingdesign

comments.content:
Ex-Hallmark artist Rob Leuschke is a source of script styles that at times look like some of the Sudtipos collection. His [Qwigley](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415203813/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/typesetit/qwigley-rob/) is somewhat like your sample. He does a lot of custom work, and this might be one of his.

- Mike Yanega

Looking at some of the Sudtipos fonts at MyFonts, it's hard to believe it wasn't done by Angel Koziupa, as your first impulse suggested. Look how similar the lettering looks in [Pronto](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415203813/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/pronto/).There are others that are also very similar, just not this exact font (yet), in what I have seen.

- Mike Yanega

Thought I had it... [Flavour](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415203813/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/hubertjocham/flavour/). Well it's close.  
Agreed looks very much like those Sudtipos scripts.
